tool_description: Comparison of similarity between two texts using popular algorithms.
name: Text Similarity Checker
title: Text Similarity Checker

api_list.name: check_similarity
api_list.description: Please provide "Text 1" and "Text 2" for the comparison.

required_parameters.name: text2
required_parameters.default: The Sun stands as a radiant symbol of vitality in the celestial realm. Its resplendent corona unveils itself amidst eclipses, captivating the denizens of Earth.

required_parameters.name: text1
required_parameters.default: The Sun is a dazzling beacon of life in the heavens. Its brilliant corona unfurls during eclipses, captivating Earth's inhabitants.
